hibernate-mapping.query: select new org.mifos.application.customer.business.CustomerView(customer.customerId,customer.displayName,customer.customerLevel.levelId,customer.searchId) from org.mifos.application.customer.business.CustomerBO customer where customer.personnel.personnelId=:personnelId and customer.office.officeId=:officeId and customer.customerLevel.levelId=:customerLevelId and customer.customerStatus.statusId in (13,9,10) order by customer.displayName

select new org.mifos.application.customer.business.CustomerView(customer.customerId,customer.displayName,customer.parentCustomer.customerId,customer.customerLevel.levelId) from org.mifos.application.customer.business.CustomerBO as customer where customer.searchId like :SEARCH_STRING and customer.office.officeId = :OFFICE_ID and customer.customerStatus.statusId in (3,4,9,10) order by customer.displayName

select customer.customerId from org.mifos.application.customer.business.CustomerBO as customer where customer.searchId like :SEARCH_STRING and customer.office.officeId = :OFFICE_ID order by customer.customerId

select distinct account.loanOffering from org.mifos.application.accounts.loan.business.LoanBO account, org.mifos.application.accounts.business.AccountActionDateEntity actionDate where account.customer.personnel.personnelId=:personnelId and account.customer.searchId like :searchId and ((account.accountId=actionDate.account.accountId and account.customer.customerId=actionDate.customer.customerId and actionDate.actionDate=:meetingDate and account.loanOffering.prdOfferingId != null and account.accountState.id in (5,9)) or (account.accountState.id in (3,4) and account.disbursementDate<=:meetingDate)) order by account.customer.customerLevel.levelId,account.loanOffering.prdOfferingShortName

select distinct account.savingsOffering from org.mifos.application.accounts.savings.business.SavingsBO account, org.mifos.application.accounts.business.AccountActionDateEntity actionDate where account.accountId=actionDate.account.accountId and actionDate.actionDate=:meetingDate and account.savingsOffering.prdOfferingId != null and account.customer.personnel.personnelId=:personnelId and account.customer.searchId like :searchId and account.accountState.id=16 and (account.customer.customerId=actionDate.customer.customerId or account.customer.customerLevel.levelId=3 or (account.customer.customerLevel.levelId=2 and account.savingsOffering.recommendedAmntUnit.recommendedAmntUnitId=1)) order by account.customer.customerLevel.levelId,account.savingsOffering.prdOfferingShortName

from org.mifos.application.customer.business.CustomerBO as customer where customer.searchId like :SEARCH_STRING and customer.office.officeId = :OFFICE_ID and customer.customerLevel.levelId = :LEVEL_ID and customer.customerStatus.statusId not in (6,12)
from org.mifos.application.accounts.loan.business.LoanBO as loan where loan.customer.customerId=:CUSTOMER_ID and loan.accountState.id in (1,2,3,4,5,9)
from org.mifos.application.accounts.savings.business.SavingsBO as savings where savings.customer.customerId=:CUSTOMER_ID and savings.accountState.id in (13,14,16,18)

from org.mifos.application.customer.business.CustomerBO as customer where customer.searchId like :SEARCH_STRING and customer.office.officeId = :OFFICE_ID and customer.customerLevel.levelId < :LEVEL_ID and customer.customerStatus.statusId in (3,4,9,10)
select customer.customerId from org.mifos.application.customer.business.CustomerBO as customer where customer.customerLevel.levelId =:LEVEL_ID
